changeSet.sql: update FEATURE_T f set group_name=(select NAME from APPLICATION_T a where a.APPLICATION_ID=f.APPLICATION_ID)

changeSet.author: emtudorsm
changeSet.sql: update OPTION_T o set group_name=(select NAME from APPLICATION_T a where a.APPLICATION_ID=o.APPLICATION_ID)

changeSet.author: emdouniat
changeSet.sql: update SCOPE_T s set ACTIVE_FROM=now() where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
update SCOPE_T s set ACTIVE_TO=now()+interval '1 year' where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
update SCOPE_T s set DATA_FROM=now() where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
update SCOPE_T s set DATA_TO=now()+interval '1 year' where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'

changeSet.author: emdouniat
changeSet.sql: update SCOPE_T s set ACTIVE_FROM=(select sysdate from dual) where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
update SCOPE_T s set ACTIVE_TO=(select add_months(sysdate, 12) from dual) where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
update SCOPE_T s set DATA_FROM=(select sysdate from dual) where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
update SCOPE_T s set DATA_TO=(select add_months(sysdate, 12) from dual) where s.NAME='GRC Quotas'
